amendment.description: Amendment sought to create a grant program for States to create or expand biliteracy seal programs to recognize student proficiency in speaking, reading, and writing in both English and a second language for graduating high school seniors.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 39 printed in part B of House Report 114-29 to create a grant program for states to create or expand biliteracy seal programs to recognize student proficiency in speaking, reading, and writing in both English and a second language for graduating high school seniors.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brownley (CA) amendment (A039) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 239 (Roll no. 415).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Brownley (CA) amendment (A039) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 239 (Roll no. 415).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A039) offered by Ms. Brownley (CA).
